Template files

Source: R/template.R
template.Rd

Use these files as templates for your own sandpaper lesson

Usage

template_gitignore()

template_episode()

template_links()

template_citation()

template_config()

template_conduct()

template_index()

template_license()

template_contributing()

template_setup()

template_pkgdown()

template_placeholder()

template_pr_diff()

template_sidebar_item()

template_metadata()

Value

a character string with the path to the template within the {sandpaper} repo.

Examples


cat(readLines(template_gitignore(), n = 6), sep = "\n")
#> # sandpaper files
#> episodes/*html
#> site/*
#> !site/README.md
#> 
#> # History files
